subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter Jorge Sosa did not make it past the fourth inning in the Braves’ victory over the Mets that drew them within a game and a half of the lead in the National League East.
snippet: Starter Jorge Sosa did not make it past the fourth inning in the Braves’ victory over the Mets that drew them within a game and a half of the lead in the National League East.
